description: This pack has seen a lot of use, and I've had no issues so far! It's a good pack.

name: Hiking bag and boots
description: Boots and bag barely worn

name: Hiking Backpack
description: Great pack, some small tears but otherwise great

name: Two Hiking Backpacks
description: Two well loved hiking packs available! They'll get you wherever you need to go!

name: Full Hiking Equipment
description: Kit with everything from a bedroll to a stick to cooking equipment and boots. Everything you need for a journey.

name: Child Carry Pack
description: My kids grew out of this before we got to use it but maybe it'll work for yours! Pack for carrying your kids on your hike

name: Dog Pack
description: Pack to bring your pup on climbing excursions. Clean and ready to go.

name: Waist Holster
description: Waist support for climbing gear. Dirty but strong and safe.

name: Climbing Kit
description: Helmet, Packs, Shoes, Rope, and Carabiners for climbing barely used.

name: Chalk Pack
description: Used for chalk. Pretty dirty and messy but works well.

name: Climbing Packs
description: Packs for chalk, carabiners, etc. Both look rough but do their job.

name: Climbing rope
description: Dirty and a little stained, but rope is strong and not frayed or torn. Sturdy and ready for climbing.

name: Bag
description: bag barely used with some gear good for climbing, camping, hiking, etc

name: Home Workout Set
description: Yoga mat, weights, water bottle, and shoes women's size 7 for at home workout.

name: Fishing Pole
description: Fishing pole and folding chair. Used but both work well.

name: Bag
description: Never used trail bag for travel.

name: Rain Gear
description: Rain boots and umbrella. Scuffed but ok condition.

name: Two Water Bottles
description: Two clean water bottles - good for hiking or running or whatever! Please clean before returning.

name: Gloves
description: Men's size medium gloves. Good condition, small tear on one.

name: Waterproof Gloves
description: Women's size small pink waterproof gloves.

name: Snow Skis
description: Mens snow skis with poles, shoes, and helmet. Shoes are men's size 10.

name: 3 Sets Snow Skis
description: Three sets of of skis, boots, poles, and everything you need. Shoes are women's sizes - one size 7 and two size 8.

name: Snow Suit
description: Suit size sm - light but warm. Wear long underwear underneath if it's really cold! Few stains and the zipper sticks sometimes, but not bad condition.

name: Snow Shoes
description: Show shoes barely used - you won't sink with these babies.

name: Motor Boat
description: Boat set up on the dock. We can meet you at the dock and show you how to tie it off and work the motor. Please refill the tank after use and be careful with our trusty baby.

name: Jetski
description: Jetski ready for anyone by the lake that wants to borrow. Please refill the tank when you are finished!

name: Paddleboard
description: Paddleboard with minimal use - paddle included.

name: Kayak
description: Two person kayak - scuffed but no leaks

name: Water Ski
description: Well loved water ski ready for the waves

name: Surfboards - 2
